sentences.sContent: The phil- in philately is the same as in Philadelphia, the city of brotherly love, or in audiophile a lover of high end stereo equipment.
sentences.sContent_eng: The phil- in philately is the same as in Philadelphia, the city of brotherly love, or in audiophile a lover of high end stereo equipment.
sentences.sCn: Philately单词中的phil-，同于“博爱城”费城Philadelphia中的Phi-，或者高端音响设备爱好者audiophile中的Phi-。

remMethod.val: audio(声音的) + phile(爱好) → 爱玩声音 → 唱片爱好者

trans.tranCn: 唱片爱好者；爱玩高级音响的人
trans.tranOther: a person who has a great interest in high-fidelity sound reproduction
